page.title: 09SCHOOL, HASELOR, WARKS.
page.content: Besides the usual English,maths,R.E., science,project,music,P.E., art and craft we do other interesting things. Every Thursday afternoon the juniors go swimming to Studley baths in a minibus. Several mothers also go to help teach us.At the end of the Summer Term one of the mothers organises a Swimming Gala,the infants go to cheer for their House.We are divided into 3 Houses,Drake,Raleigh,Nelson.Sports Day also takes place in the Summer Term. Sir William & Lady Lawrence of Walcote invites the whole school to their lawn for our races.Lady Lawrence also puts on a lovely tea for us and buys us all a present.At Christmas we do a concert on two afternoons. The infants do a Nativity play,the junior classes do a musical play each.We also have a Carol Service in the church one evening and a Christmas party in school.
